description:
Dragon is back and suffers through a non-stop Hogtied shoot. No cuts, no breaks, no rest. You see all the rigging on camera, all the action without editing and without a single pause. You witness a true scene between two people without rehearsal, this is as real as BDSM gets unless you are physically present.
DragonLily ensures some very tight ties, a full wrist suspension, a zipper, a brutal hogtie, and many massive orgasms. On top of it all, Dragon is the most ticklish girl we've ever met, and we tickle the shit out of her without compassion.
title: DragonLily is back and is doing a realtime Hogtied shoot.
